Fausto Rodrigues de Amorim

  • Endereço para acessar este CV: http://lattes.cnpq.br/4269388862601108
  • Última atualização do currículo em 27/05/2019

Graduate in Environmental Engineering at Federal University of Viçosa (2004), master degree in Sanitation, Environment and Water Resources at Federal University of Belo Horizonte (2007), specialist in Safety Engineearing in University of Rio Verde (2011), doctorate at Federal University of Uberlândia (2018) with excheng program of 1 year in Queensland University of Tecnology (Australia). Has experience in Sanitary and Environmental Engineering, acting on the following subjects: environmental licensing, solids residues treatment; wastewater treatment, biofuel prodution. (Texto informado pelo autor)
